title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Avoiding the big error: What to watch out for in data
description: Tips on how to avoid common mistakes when working with data, including checking for outliers, nulls, and data quality, as well as watching for errors in geocoding and mapping.
